thread.title: Perfect hotel close to the Eiffel Tower
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel close to the Eiffel Tower - Review of Le Parisis Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: dulllo
title: Perfect hotel close to the Eiffel Tower
text: I stayed in this hotel with my family last July when we visited Paris for a week. It was the perfect place to stay while during the days we were sightseeing in Paris. Very nice hotel. Quiet though close to the metro. Room was comparable to rooms in other EU cities though in Paris hotels tend to be more narrow than in other cities. Still we loved our stay there. Would recommend it for tourists planning to see Paris.
